R8000C.title: THE R8000C
R8000C.text: Weighing just 14 pounds, the R8000 is the only test set to offer complete benchtop functionality in a portable, software-defined package.

R8100.title: THE R8100
R8100.text: Ultra-portable premium product, it has all the functionalities and test capabilities of our R8000.

R8200.title: THE R8200
R8200.text: It is the only service monitor with the ability to display RF parameters on a Smith chart for more complicated network analysis.

R8600.title: THE R8600
R8600.text: The R8600 Radio Test Hub is designed to meet the demanding requirements of RF production environments.
